pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sale Promotion Coupon Module############################The sale_promotion_coupon module adds coupon to the promotions.A promotion with coupons will be applied only if a linked coupon has been addedon the sale.Promotion Coupon****************It defines the behaviours of a sets of coupon numbers for a promotion:- *Name*: The name of the coupon.- *Promotion*: The promotion to which the coupon is attached.- *Number of Use*: How much time a coupon number can be used.- *Per Party*: How the usage is counted.- *Numbers*: The list of numbers which must be unique.
